name: Roll For Romance
description:
Welcome to Roll For Romance!  A furry dating sim by nerds, for nerds. You play as a college student who gets dragged into the wacky world of  Centaurs and Cantrips  (a TTRPG much like our own world's Dungeons and Dragons). Make new friends, go on adventures, and live your dream college life simultaneously!

There are four love interests with each of them being somewhere underneath the non-binary umbrella. There are LI's across all sides of the spectrum, as well as one potential polyamorous relationship so there's something for everyone. 

There will be 15 in game days of prologue,  then the game will branch out to the route of your choice.  

 Updates will be released monthly/bi-monthly 1-3 in-game days at a time. 

NOTE: This game is a giant WIP so things will be cleaned up and redrawn as time goes on. Think of this as a cleaner version of a first draft. 

SECOND NOTE:  Please adjust text speed to your liking. As of right now, it is slow. We'll fix this asap.
